preset_info.title: HELLO WORLD ALLTALE SYSTEM
preset_info.description: 管理者権限で好き勝手しやがる！
preset_info.author: Nal

tbathmax.title: tBatHMax
tbathmax.value: $mu(max, bi(level, r0m), bi(level, r5m), bi(level, r10m), bi(level, r10m), bi(level, r15m), bi(level, r20m), bi(level, r25m), bi(level, r30m), bi(level, r35m), bi(level, r40m), bi(level, r45m), bi(level, r50m), bi(level, r55m), bi(level, r60m))$

nstrth.title: nStrTh
nstrth.description: ストレージ容量警告値 (%)

tcamid.title: tCamID
tcamid.description: ロック画面の左の文字列

cscreen.title: cScreen
cscreen.description: 画面のデフォルトの色味

viewgroup_items.internal_title: ウインドウコンテンツ
ウインドウコンテンツ

viewgroup_items.text_expression: $if(ts(mt, m, 1d) / gv(tDataMax) * 100 < 100, tc(lpad, mu(round, mu(floor, ts(mt, m, 1d) / gv(tDataMax) * 100)), 2, 0), "f")$

internal_formulas.shape_width: $si(rwidth)/2 * mu(min, 1, mu(max, 0, df(d) / gv(tDayNumM) - ts(mt, m, 1d) / gv(tDataMax))) + 20$

internal_formulas.paint_color: $if(mi(state) = PLAYING, ce(ce(bp(dominant, mi(cover)), sat, 50), lum, 50), gv(cScreen, #00000000))$
